items.sentence: He does nothing but read books all day long.
He knows the area like the back of his hand.
I haven't seen my ex-wife since our divorce.
I often nod off on the bus and miss my stop.
The canary is in the cage on the windowsill.
Did you see the fireworks on New Year's Eve?
You're my friend whether you like it or not.
Tom will be released from prison in October.
Tom won't likely be able to find a good job.
We share some of the blame for this failure.
If the food's cold, put it in the microwave.
This shouldn't be hard for us to figure out.
Eventually, my patience is going to run out.
Allow me to demonstrate my invention to you.
I think you've had enough candy for one day.
I think you've been trying to make me angry.
Am I that much different from everyone else?
How much does it cost to stay at that hotel?
Would it be OK if we stayed a little longer?
I don't want another girlfriend. I want you.
